original_text: They will use heavy pieces of wood to knock down the city's walls. They will use their weapons to knock down the strong towers.
korean_text: 공성퇴를 가지고 네 성을 치며 도끼로 망대를 찍을 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will use heavy pieces of wood
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무거운 나무 조각들을 사용할 것이다

sentences.original_text: to knock down the city's walls
to knock down the strong towers
